item.title: A JavaScript developer's guide to Rails: Authorization with Pundit
item.content:encoded: Learn how Pundit authorization actually works in Rails, from request flow to policy scopes, with practical examples for JavaScript developers.

item.title: The Bike Shed Ep 494: Primitive Obsession
item.content:encoded: Joël and Sally examine the simpler components of programming and why using basic data structures may not always be the best approach to solving a problem.

item.title: props_template 1.0: A high performance, more opinionated jbuilder replacement
item.content:encoded: props_template 1.0: A high performance, more opinionated jbuilder replacement

item.title: A JavaScript developer's guide to Rails: What is Polymorphic Rails Model?
item.content:encoded: Learn how Rails polymorphic associations work under the hood, from database schema to model setup, with clear examples for JavaScript developers new to ActiveRecord.
